overview: "Evil Shit" is a short movie compilation containing the following 4 films:  -Die Profis: 3 professional killers are confronted with a "victim" that just won't die...  -Der Schiss: a nasty parasite turns Al into a rabid cannibal...  -Der Keller: Linda finds herself chained up in the cellar of a sadistic killer...  -Das Tape: Mike records a new guitar riff on an old tape. When he tries to play it back to his friends at a party, all hell breaks loose...
title: Evil Shit
